# Resource: auth0_flow

With this resource, you can create and manage Flows for a tenant.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the flow.

### Optional

- `actions` (String) Actions of the flow.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
